Donate Now

Get Involved

Quality in Action

Educare of Chicago is the Ounce of Prevention Fund's state-of-the-art school that serves approximately 150 at-risk infants, toddlers, and preschoolers in Chicago's Grand Boulevard neighborhood. We invite you to tour Educare to learn why it has become a national model at narrowing the achievement gap for low-income children.

Schedule a Tournavigateright

Make a gift

You can make a tax-deductible gift to the Ounce in one of the following ways:
